plot: Four strangers forced together. Their secrets more lethal than the bombs they run from. Will humanity prevail? Or have the battle lines already been drawn?
title: The Purge
plot_es: Four strangers forced together. Their secrets more lethal than the bombs they run from. Will humanity prevail? Or have the battle lines already been drawn?
plot_en: Four strangers forced together. Their secrets more lethal than the bombs they run from. Will humanity prevail? Or have the battle lines already been drawn?
